amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to include within the report on 5G technology, the threat to natio nal security of the United States posed by telecommunications companies that are subject to the jurisdiction of a foreign adversary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Yoho.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
